messages.start:
Good day {}. Welcome to BLyrics 🎵📃
I can get you your favorite song lyrics and information, artist information. I can also deliver articles from the genius webpage 🤓
messages.menu:
What would you like to search for? 😀

🧐
messages.help:
How to use lyrically 😁

 /start - Start the bot 
 /songs - Start searching for songs 
 /artist - Search about an artist 
 /articles - View recent news 
 /donate - Give to Lyrically
messages.donate:
